definitions.definition: a single unit of language that has meaning and can be spoken or written:
examples: Your essay should be no more than two thousand words long.

definitions.definition: used to refer to a word, usually a rude or embarrassing one, by saying only the first letter and not the whole word:
examples: You're still not allowed to say the F-word on TV in the US

definitions.definition: to choose the words you use when you are saying or writing something:
examples: He worded the reply in such a way that he did not admit making the original error.
